abstract_summ: Adapting to this new paradigm during this pandemic has been ever-changing and extraordinarily challenging, both personally and professionally.eLife is making changes to its policies on peer review in response to the impact of COVID-19 on the scientific community.The covid-19 pandemic could lead to extreme poverty that leaves many struggling to afford food, reports Adam VaughanPeople’s experiences of the COVID-19 pandemic vary widely, with some groups suffering disproportionately.
title_summ: In the Same Storm but Different BoatsCOVID-19: The Worst Days of Our CareersPublishing in the time of COVID-19Global food crisis looms
